        public static boolean isTheSameDay(Calendar dayOne,

        Check if the calendars are referring to the same day
        Parameters:
        dayOne - the day one
        dayTwo - the day two
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        dayOne - the day one

        Returns:

      • isTheSameDay

        public static boolean isTheSameDay(Date dayOne,
                                   Date dayTwo,
                                   TimeZone userTimeZone)
        Check if the dates are referring to the same day and add set the timezone
        Parameters:
        dayOne - the day one with respect to the timezone
        dayTwo - the day two with respect to the timezone
        userTimeZone - for timezone specific comparison; can be null
        Returns:
        true if the days are equal

      • isToday

        public static boolean isToday(Date day)
        Check if the dates are referring to the same day
        Parameters:
        day - the day one
        Returns:
        true if the days are equal

      • nowBefore

        public static long nowBefore(long time)
        Use as nowBefore(14*DateHelper.DAYS)
        Parameters:
        time - the time to subtract from now
        Returns:
        now before the given time

      • nowBeforeTrimToMidnight

        public static long nowBeforeTrimToMidnight(long time)
        Subtract the time from now and reset the time of the given day
        Parameters:
        time - the time to subtract from now
        Returns:
        the date in milliseconds from today minus the date given but set to midnight of the same day

      • nowBeforeXMonths

        public static long nowBeforeXMonths(int x)
        Use as nowBeforeXMonths(1) to get the time of today before one month
        Parameters:
        x - the number of months to substract from today
        Returns:
        now before x months
